Title
------------

### Acquisition of Afterloader System {#title}

This notice is for the solicitation of a contractor to provide a replacement afterloader system to National Research Council Canada (NRC). The selected contractor will be responsible for the supply, installation, testing, and commissioning of the afterloader system at the NRC's facilities in Ottawa.

-------------

*   **Reference Number:** cb-434-91523772
*   **Amendment Number:** 5
*   **Solicitation Number:** 23-58194
*   **Publication Date:** January 29, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** February 13, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 15, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

Procurement Information
----------------------

*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Tender Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **UNSPSC Code:** 41100000 (Laboratory and scientific equipment)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa

*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 1200 Montreal Road, Building M35, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada
